> As manthros's body lays lifeless on the ground, Denzu stands over
him with 
> whip in hand. "So, this is where the pod went, I take it you came
out of it" 
> He hits Manthors with the whip again, an electric shock makes the
body jolt. 
> He looks at Blackheart. "Do I know you......."
